homepage.title: Do you have a project brief to create?
homepage.subtitle: Let our AI assistant help you
homepage.description: Brief Project transforms your notes and exchanges into a clear, structured project brief ready to share in seconds.
homepage.cta_button: Test Our Brief Project AI Assistant for free

features.question_description: Our AI guides you to frame objectives, risks, deliverables and stakeholders.
features.time_description: No more back and forth and briefs written at the last minute.
features.quality_description: A clear, homogeneous brief directly usable by your teams.

additional_cta.title: Ready to create your perfect project brief?
additional_cta.description: Start your conversation with our AI assistant now and discover the power of automated project brief creation.

chat.title: AirSaas AI Assistant
chat.audio_error: I couldn't process your audio, could you write it instead?

initial_message.greeting: Hello, I'm here to assist you to create a well-structured project. Let's take it step by step.
initial_message.template_question: Which template of project brief do you want to use?
initial_message.lets_start_template: Let's start a {{template}}, start your first question!

basic_storytelling.title: Basic Story Telling
basic_storytelling.description: This template focuses on presenting your project in a straightforward narrative format. It emphasizes the project's context, objectives, and expected outcomes, making it easy to understand the overall purpose and direction.

emotional_storytelling.title: Emotional Story Telling
emotional_storytelling.description: This template takes a more engaging approach by incorporating emotional elements into the narrative. It aims to connect with the audience on a deeper level, highlighting the human impact of the project and inspiring action through storytelling.

pdf_modal.title: Thank you for using this tool!
pdf_modal.description: This tool is free. If it helped you, share it on LinkedIn!
pdf_modal.error_message: Error generating PDF. Please try again.
pdf_modal.share_text: I just used this amazing free tool to create my project plan! Check it out:
